publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2824 Alex Neil: Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government to ensure that there will be a separate Scottish result declared for any UK-wide referendum on membership of the euro.
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Stewart Stevenson*
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Michael Russell*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-2824 Alex Neil: Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum—That the Parliament calls upon the Scottish Executive to make representations to Her Majesty’s Government to ensure that there will be a separate Scottish result declared for any UK-wide referendum on membership of the euro. Supported by: Stewart Stevenson, Michael Russell, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Irene McGugan*
S1M-2824 Separate Scottish Results for UK Euro Referendum (lodged on 4 March 2002) Dr Winnie Ewing*
